title: Anurag Gotety
short: I am a Full-stack engineer with a passion for UI/UX, AR gaming, and creative tech. I build immersive, performant apps blending design, systems thinking, and real-world interactivity.
long: Built ARDI, a React Native adventure game blending treasure hunts, escape rooms, and geocaching, with Stripe integration and Google Sign-In
Designed immersive AR gameplay with ViroReact, including real-time object tracking and interactive 3D challenges
Engineered performant frontends with React Hooks, Context API, lazy loading, and modular UI components
Created UI systems and menus for Unity games like 'Portal Defender' and 'Erin and the Otherworld'
Developed full-stack web apps using Django, Express.js, and MongoDB—featuring real-time UI, authentication, and clean UX
Prototyped CNN models with TensorFlow to classify images and explore computer vision for real-world use cases
Skilled in JavaScript, Python, C#, SQL, TypeScript, and GLSL—across web, mobile, and game dev platforms
